channel.title: Oracle Unified Directory on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Oracle Unified Directory on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Review the latest changes and known issues for Oracle Unified Directory on Kubernetes. Recent changes Date Version Change July, 2022 22.3.1 Supports Oracle Unified Directory 12.2.1.4 domain deployment using the July 2022 container image which contains the July Patch Set Update (PSU) and other fixes released with the Critical Patch Update (CPU) program. From July 2022 onwards OUD deployment is performed using StatefulSets. April, 2022 22.

item.title: Patch and Upgrade
item.description: Introduction Upgrading to July 22 (22.3.1) or later from earlier versions Upgrading from July 22 (22.3.1) to a later release Introduction In this section the Oracle Unified Directory (OUD) deployment is updated with a new OUD container image. Upgrading to July 22 (22.3.1) or later from earlier versions In releases prior to July 22 (22.3.1) OUD used pod based deployment. From July 22 (22.3.1) onwards OUD is deployed using StatefulSets.
